CustomField.formula:
if(isblank( X7_PPA_or_EPC_Contract_Executed__c ),".......................", "(7) " & If(len(text(Month(X7_PPA_or_EPC_Contract_Executed__c))) = 1, "0" & text(Month( X7_PPA_or_EPC_Contract_Executed__c)), text(Month( X7_PPA_or_EPC_Contract_Executed__c))) & "/" & If (len(text(Day( X7_PPA_or_EPC_Contract_Executed__c))) =1, "0" & text(Day( X7_PPA_or_EPC_Contract_Executed__c)), text(Day(X7_PPA_or_EPC_Contract_Executed__c))) & "/" & text(Year(X7_PPA_or_EPC_Contract_Executed__c)))
&" " &
If(isblank( X8_Internal_Investment_Approval__c )," ......................", "(8) " & IF(len(text(Month( X8_Internal_Investment_Approval__c))) = 1, "0" & text(Month( X8_Internal_Investment_Approval__c)), text(Month( X8_Internal_Investment_Approval__c))) & "/" & If (len(text(Day( X8_Internal_Investment_Approval__c))) =1, "0" & text(Day( X8_Internal_Investment_Approval__c)), text(Day( X8_Internal_Investment_Approval__c))) & "/" & text(Year( X8_Internal_Investment_Approval__c)))
CustomField.label: zzArchiv(7) PPA/EPC...... (8) Inv Commit
